00025 Implemente_instanciable(MultipleFiles,"MultipleFiles",Interprete);

00027 Sortie& MultipleFiles::printOn(Sortie& os) const
00028 {
00029   return Interprete::printOn(os);

00031 Entree& MultipleFiles::readOn(Entree& is)
00032 {
00033   return Interprete::readOn(is);

00035 Entree& MultipleFiles::interpreter(Entree& is)
00036 {
00037 // XD MultipleFiles interprete MultipleFiles -1 Change MPI rank limit for multiple files during I/O
00038 // XD attr type entier type 0 New MPI rank limit
00039   is >> multiple_files;
00040   Cerr << "MultipleFiles::interpreter : Above " << multiple_files << " MPI ranks, all I/O should be done with single file." << finl;
00041   return is;
00042 }
